title: Gelish Foundation and Top Coat "Set of 2" Ship Now
description: This wonderful set of Base and Top Coat gel provides the basics for any style of manicure or pedicure.Gelish Foundation Base Gel creates the adhesive bond between the nail plate and gel products. This product secures adhesion while not damaging the natural nail plate. Foundation will work with Hand & Nail Harmony Gelish products as a base for Soak Off Gel Polish. Gelish Foudation cures in 10 seconds in a LED Light or 30 seconds in an UV Light.Gelish Top It Off Gel is a sealer top gel designed to create the ultimate finish with your Gelish Soak Off Polish. It creates a high shine that will not dull, chip or peel. Top It Off is a soak off product that can quickly be removed with Soak Off Gel Remover. This coat cures in 30 seconds in a LED Light or 2 minutes in a UV Light.

title: USpicy Anti-UV Gloves for UV Light / Lamp / Nail Dryer & LED UV Nail Dryer Curing
description: USpicy-Fashion Meets TechnologyUSpicy was created by a very simple goal - to provide high quality health and beauty products at budget-friendly prices so that everyone can afford. Why "U•Spicy"? Because we put the sole focus on YOU, and dedicate ourselves to creating your own unique style, which allows YOU to feel SPICY whenever & wherever.These gloves are designed To protect your skin from harmful UV lights. Put the gloves on before applying nail polish and make sure your skin is covered as much as possible, only finger tips and nails are left under the UV light.Highly recommend using this glove with the USpicy nail dryers.Features:- 98% UV protection during nail drying- Extended length for extra protection above your wirst- Lightweight and durable micro-fabric construction- One size fits most- Machine-washable- Gloves slip on and off easily.Specifications:- Color: white- Size: one size fits most- Processing Mode: Machine sewing- Material: Polyester fibre- Function: Anti-UV radiationPackage includes:- 1* Pair USpicy anti-UV gloves for UV Light / Lamp / nail dryer & LED UV nail dryer
